MonitorApp.name: MonitorApp

constructors.description:
MonitorApp is a YUI Widget class representing the monitor application UI.

The widget is usually placed within the top element of a blank page.

params.name: e
params.description: Custom event for the attribute change

_afterStringsChange.description:
Updates the UI if changes are made to any of the strings in the strings
attribute.

syncUI.description: Sync the UI state to the current attribute state.

params.name: e
params.description: The event object - to determine the tab clicked

_onTabChange.description: Process the desktop tab change event

destructor.description:
Tears down the instance, flushing event subscriptions and purging 
the UI.

_initLocalStorage().description:
Initialize from local storage, and add this connected host to
the list of processes if it's not there already.

params.name: id
params.description: Tab ID - must exist in localStorage

params.name: id
params.description: Remote process ID - must exist in localStorage

_addProcess().description: Add a new remote process widget to the browser

bindUI.description: Set up event listeners to wire up the UI to the internal state.

_persist().description: Persist any configuration changes stored in the _storage object.

initializer.description:
Constructor code.  Initialize member variables from attributes
and browser localStorage.

renderUI.description:
Generate the user interface.  This method is called by the YUI 
framework once to render the DOM for the UI.

_desktop.description:
Reference to the Node instance containing the desktop - the right
portion of the application that contains the tabs for switching
among monitor screens.

_body.description:
Reference to the Node instance containing everything below 
the header.

_header.description: Reference to the Node instance containing the header contents.

_rpc.description: Reference to the JSON-RPC object for server interactions

_storage.description: The object stored into local storage for this _storageId.

_browser.description: Reference to the Node instance that will house the console messages.

_footer.description: Reference to the Node instance that contains the page footer

_storageId.description:
Persistent ID for this instance, used as the key to localStorage
for persistent attributes.  Set during construction based on the 
id attribute.

_evtCat.description:
Category to prefix all event subscriptions to allow for ease of 
detach during destroy.

MonitorApp.description:
MonitorApp is a YUI Widget class representing the monitor application UI.

The widget is usually placed within the top element of a blank page.

MonitorUI-Client.description: Browser-side elements for the Monitor UI.
MonitorUI-Client.name: MonitorUI-Client
